trans-unit.resname: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a coding enthusiast who loves to create and tinker with applications. I help businesses and individuals design high-performance, user-friendly, and well-thought-out applications—from robust back-end systems to polished user interfaces. Whether it’s a showcase website, a business platform, or a custom tool, each project is an opportunity for me to blend technical precision, creativity, and user experience. Looking for a developer who understands your needs, masters their stack, and delivers real results? Let’s talk!
trans-unit.source: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a coding enthusiast who loves to create and tinker with applications. I help businesses and individuals design high-performance, user-friendly, and well-thought-out applications—from robust back-end systems to polished user interfaces. Whether it’s a showcase website, a business platform, or a custom tool, each project is an opportunity for me to blend technical precision, creativity, and user experience. Looking for a developer who understands your needs, masters their stack, and delivers real results? Let’s talk!
trans-unit.target: Bienvenue sur mon portfolio ! Je suis un passionné de code qui adore créer et bidouiller des applications. J’accompagne les entreprises et les particuliers dans la conception d’applications performantes, ergonomiques et bien pensées, du back-end robuste à l’interface utilisateur soignée. Que ce soit pour un site vitrine, une plateforme métier ou un outil sur-mesure, chaque projet est pour moi une opportunité de mêler rigueur technique, créativité et expérience utilisateur. Tu recherches un développeur qui comprend tes besoins, maîtrise sa stack, et livre des résultats concrets ? Parlons-en !

trans-unit.resname: I create custom websites for businesses or individuals. Using programming languages and development tools I design functional and attractive websites that meet your specific needs:
trans-unit.source: I create custom websites for businesses or individuals. Using programming languages and development tools I design functional and attractive websites that meet your specific needs:
trans-unit.target: Je crée des sites web personnalisés pour les entreprises ou les particuliers. En utilisant des langages de programmation et des outils de développement je concevoir des sites web fonctionnels et attrayants qui répondent à vos besoins spécifiques :

trans-unit.resname: Integration of third-party systems and applications.
trans-unit.source: Integration of third-party systems and applications.
trans-unit.target: Intégration de systèmes et d'applications tiers.
Maintenance et support de sites web.

trans-unit.resname: I work to create clear, intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user interfaces for websites and applications, using a variety of design tools and techniques. This service includes :
trans-unit.source: I work to create clear, intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user interfaces for websites and applications, using a variety of design tools and techniques. This service includes :

trans-unit.resname: I develop content strategies that strengthen your corporate brands, using digital channels such as social networks, blogs, videos and podcasts. My job is to:
trans-unit.source: I develop content strategies that strengthen your corporate brands, using digital channels such as social networks, blogs, videos and podcasts. My job is to:
trans-unit.target: J'élabore des stratégies de contenu qui renforcent l'image de vos marques d'entreprise, en utilisant des canaux numériques, tels que les réseaux sociaux, les blogs, les vidéos et les podcasts. Mon travail consiste à :

trans-unit.resname: Creation of editorial and visual content.
trans-unit.source: Creation of editorial and visual content.
trans-unit.target: La création de contenu éditorial et visuel.
La stratégie de marketing de contenu.

trans-unit.resname: I manage your company's online presence on social networks. I work to establish and develop positive relationships with customers and followers on social networks, creating and sharing engaging and relevant content for the audience.
trans-unit.source: I manage your company's online presence on social networks. I work to establish and develop positive relationships with customers and followers on social networks, creating and sharing engaging and relevant content for the audience.
trans-unit.target: Je gère la présence en ligne de vos entreprises sur les réseaux sociaux. Je travaille à établir et à développer des relations positives avec les clients et les abonnés sur les réseaux sociaux, en créant et en partageant du contenu engageant et pertinent pour l'audience.
La gestion de comptes de médias sociaux.
La planification et la création de contenu.

trans-unit.resname: Measuring the impact of social media campaigns.
trans-unit.source: Measuring the impact of social media campaigns.
trans-unit.target: La mesure de l'impact des campagnes de médias sociaux.

trans-unit.resname: I work to improve the visibility and ranking of your websites in organic search results. I optimize your websites for search engines, using a variety of techniques, such as:
trans-unit.source: I work to improve the visibility and ranking of your websites in organic search results. I optimize your websites for search engines, using a variety of techniques, such as:
trans-unit.target: Je travaille à améliorer la visibilité et le classement de vos sites web dans les résultats de recherche organiques. Je me charge d'optimiser vos sites web pour les moteurs de recherche, en utilisant une variété de techniques, telles que :

trans-unit.resname: Creation of optimized content for search engines.
trans-unit.source: Creation of optimized content for search engines.
trans-unit.target: La création de contenu optimisé pour les moteurs de recherche.

trans-unit.resname: Measuring and monitoring the performance of natural referencing.
trans-unit.source: Measuring and monitoring the performance of natural referencing.
trans-unit.target: La mesure et le suivi de la performance du référencement naturel.
Brevet de Technicien Supérieur (BTS), option IDA

trans-unit.resname: High school diploma in science and mathematics (Bac D)
trans-unit.source: High school diploma in science and mathematics (Bac D)

trans-unit.resname: Designing, administering, and maintaining websites and web applications for the agency and its clients.
trans-unit.source: Designing, administering, and maintaining websites and web applications for the agency and its clients.
trans-unit.target: Conception, Réalisation, Administration et Maintenance des sites et applications web de l'agences ainsi que de ses clients ...

trans-unit.resname: As the head of the Web Management department, I was responsible for designing and administering every website for each of our projects, as well as managing associated social media accounts.
trans-unit.source: As the head of the Web Management department, I was responsible for designing and administering every website for each of our projects, as well as managing associated social media accounts.
trans-unit.target: En tant que responsable du département Web Management j’étais chargé de concevoir et d’administrer chaque site web de chacun de nos projets et d’animer les pages associées aux réseaux sociaux.

trans-unit.resname: From 2016 to 2017 | Hardware and software department manager
trans-unit.source: From 2016 to 2017 | Hardware and software department manager
trans-unit.target: De 2016 à 2017 | Resp. du service Hardware et software

trans-unit.resname: My responsibilities included designing and administering our websites and web applications, as well as maintaining all the computer hardware.
trans-unit.source: My responsibilities included designing and administering our websites and web applications, as well as maintaining all the computer hardware.
trans-unit.target: Mes responsabilités étaient de concevoir de d’administrer nos sites et application web, en passant par l’entretient de tout le matériel informatique (Hardware).

trans-unit.resname: Using technologies such as Flutter and Dart, I develop high-performance, cross-platform, attractive mobile applications tailored to your specific needs:
trans-unit.source: Using technologies such as Flutter and Dart, I develop high-performance, cross-platform, attractive mobile applications tailored to your specific needs:
trans-unit.target: En utilisant des technologies telles que Flutter et Dart, je développe des applications mobiles performantes, multiplateformes, attractives et adaptées à vos besoins spécifiques :

trans-unit.resname: I offer DevOps services for businesses to facilitate and automate the software development lifecycle. By using modern tools and practices, I help improve the efficiency, collaboration, and continuous delivery of your applications:
trans-unit.source: I offer DevOps services for businesses to facilitate and automate the software development lifecycle. By using modern tools and practices, I help improve the efficiency, collaboration, and continuous delivery of your applications:
trans-unit.target: Je propose des services DevOps pour les entreprises afin de faciliter et d'automatiser le cycle de vie du développement logiciel. En utilisant des outils et des pratiques modernes, j'aide à améliorer l'efficacité, la collaboration et la livraison continue de vos applications :
Gestion des versions et des configurations.

trans-unit.resname: Why Flutter and Dart for Mobile App Development
trans-unit.source: Why Flutter and Dart for Mobile App Development
trans-unit.target: Pourquoi Flutter et Dart pour le développement d'applications mobiles ?

trans-unit.resname: In the world of mobile development, choosing the right technology is crucial for the success of your application. Flutter, combined with Dart, has quickly established itself as a preferred solution for many developers and businesses. But why exactly?
trans-unit.source: In the world of mobile development, choosing the right technology is crucial for the success of your application. Flutter, combined with Dart, has quickly established itself as a preferred solution for many developers and businesses. But why exactly?
trans-unit.target: Dans le monde du développement mobile, choisir la bonne technologie est crucial pour garantir le succès de votre application. Flutter, combiné avec Dart, s'est rapidement imposé comme une solution de choix pour de nombreux développeurs et entreprises. Mais pourquoi exactement ?

trans-unit.resname: DevOps and Automation in the Software Development Lifecycle
trans-unit.source: DevOps and Automation in the Software Development Lifecycle
trans-unit.target: DevOps et automatisation dans le cycle de vie du développement logiciel

trans-unit.resname: In today's technological landscape, automation has become a crucial component of software development. DevOps, a practice that combines development and IT operations, emphasizes automation to enhance the efficiency and reliability of the software development lifecycle...
trans-unit.source: In today's technological landscape, automation has become a crucial component of software development. DevOps, a practice that combines development and IT operations, emphasizes automation to enhance the efficiency and reliability of the software development lifecycle...
trans-unit.target: Dans le paysage technologique actuel, l'automatisation est devenue une composante essentielle du développement logiciel. DevOps, une pratique qui combine le développement et les opérations IT, met particulièrement l'accent sur l'automatisation pour améliorer l'efficacité et la fiabilité du cycle de vie du développement logiciel...

trans-unit.resname: Best Practices for Optimizing User Experience
trans-unit.source: Best Practices for Optimizing User Experience
trans-unit.target: Les meilleures pratiques pour optimiser l'expérience utilisateur

trans-unit.resname: User Experience (UX) is a key success factor for any website or application. Good UX design can increase user engagement, reduce bounce rates, and improve overall user satisfaction. Here are some best practices for optimizing UX in web development...
trans-unit.source: User Experience (UX) is a key success factor for any website or application. Good UX design can increase user engagement, reduce bounce rates, and improve overall user satisfaction. Here are some best practices for optimizing UX in web development...
trans-unit.target: L'expérience utilisateur (UX) est un facteur clé de succès pour tout site web ou application. Un bon design UX peut augmenter l'engagement des utilisateurs, réduire les taux de rebond et améliorer la satisfaction globale des utilisateurs. Voici quelques meilleures pratiques pour optimiser l'UX dans le développement web...

trans-unit.resname: Design and implementation of scalable and resilient software architectures. Management of deployment pipelines and automation of continuous delivery processes.
trans-unit.source: Design and implementation of scalable and resilient software architectures. Management of deployment pipelines and automation of continuous delivery processes.
trans-unit.target: Conception et mise en oeuvre d'architectures logicielles évolutives et résiliantes. Gestion des pipelines de déploiement et automatisation des processus de livraison continue.

trans-unit.resname: Development and maintenance of complete web applications, from initial design to delivery. Mentoring junior team members and sharing best practices to support their professional growth.
trans-unit.source: Development and maintenance of complete web applications, from initial design to delivery. Mentoring junior team members and sharing best practices to support their professional growth.
trans-unit.target: Développement et maintenance d'applications web complètes, de la conception initiale à la livraison. Mentorat des membres juniors de l'équipe et partage des meilleures pratiques pour favoriser leur croissance professionnelle.

trans-unit.resname: From the design to the administration of the websites, I ensured that the platforms were high-performance, secure and adapted to our customers' needs. Each site was a unique challenge that I met with passion.
trans-unit.source: From the design to the administration of the websites, I ensured that the platforms were high-performance, secure and adapted to our customers' needs. Each site was a unique challenge that I met with passion.
trans-unit.target: De la conception à l’administration des sites web, je veillais à offrir des plateformes performantes, sécurisées et adaptées aux besoins de nos clients. Chaque site était un challenge unique que je relevais avec passion.

trans-unit.resname: Confident in my ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and leverage my web and mobile development skills to ensure the team's success. Always willing to learn and go the extra mile to advance projects and achieve goals.
trans-unit.source: Confident in my ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and leverage my web and mobile development skills to ensure the team's success. Always willing to learn and go the extra mile to advance projects and achieve goals.
trans-unit.target: Confiant dans ma capacité à travailler efficacement dans un environnement en évolution rapide et à tirer parti de mes compétences en développement web et mobile, pour assurer le succès de l'équipe. Toujours prêt à apprendre et à faire des efforts supplémentaires pour faire progresser les projets et atteindre les objectifs.

trans-unit.resname: Knowledge of web security best practices (XSS, CSRF, authentication, etc.)
trans-unit.source: Knowledge of web security best practices (XSS, CSRF, authentication, etc.)
trans-unit.target: Connaissance des bonnes pratiques de sécurité web (XSS, CSRF, authentification, etc.)

trans-unit.resname: API integration, REST architecture, responsive design, collaborative UX.
trans-unit.source: API integration, REST architecture, responsive design, collaborative UX.
trans-unit.target: Intégration d’APIs, architecture REST, responsive design, UX collaboratif.

trans-unit.resname: Passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience, combining backend expertise (PHP - Symfony and Laravel) with frontend skills (React.js, Vue.js). Specialized in building high-performance, scalable, and secure web applications with a product-oriented, UX-focused, and DevOps-driven approach.
trans-unit.source: Passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience, combining backend expertise (PHP - Symfony and Laravel) with frontend skills (React.js, Vue.js). Specialized in building high-performance, scalable, and secure web applications with a product-oriented, UX-focused, and DevOps-driven approach.
trans-unit.target: Développeur full-stack passionné avec plus de 5 ans d’expérience, alliant expertise backend (PHP - Symfony et Laravel) et frontend (React.js, Vue.js). Spécialisé dans la conception d’applications web performantes, évolutives et sécurisées, avec une approche orientée produit, UX et DevOps.

trans-unit.resname: Team leadership, scalable architecture, full-stack project oversight, cloud deployment management (AWS), and strategic collaboration with stakeholders.
trans-unit.source: Team leadership, scalable architecture, full-stack project oversight, cloud deployment management (AWS), and strategic collaboration with stakeholders.
trans-unit.target: Encadrement d’équipe, architecture scalable, supervision de projets full-stack, gestion de déploiements cloud (AWS) et collaboration stratégique avec les parties prenantes.

trans-unit.resname: Web development with Django, Laravel, and Vue.js; API integration, CI/CD, Docker containerization, performance optimization, and close collaboration with product and design teams.
trans-unit.source: Web development with Django, Laravel, and Vue.js; API integration, CI/CD, Docker containerization, performance optimization, and close collaboration with product and design teams.
trans-unit.target: Développement web avec Django, Laravel, Vue.js ; intégration d’APIs, CI/CD, conteneurisation Docker, optimisation des performances et collaboration produit/design.

trans-unit.resname: API development with Laravel/Symfony, database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB), application maintenance, and continuous improvement.
trans-unit.source: API development with Laravel/Symfony, database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB), application maintenance, and continuous improvement.
trans-unit.target: Développement d’APIs avec Laravel/Symfony, gestion de bases de données (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB), maintenance applicative et amélioration continue.

trans-unit.resname: Team spirit and ability to collaborate with product, design, and technical teams.
trans-unit.source: Team spirit and ability to collaborate with product, design, and technical teams.
trans-unit.target: Esprit d’équipe et capacité à collaborer avec les équipes produit, design et technique.

trans-unit.resname: Autonomy, curiosity, and a constant desire to learn new technologies.
trans-unit.source: Autonomy, curiosity, and a constant desire to learn new technologies.
trans-unit.target: Autonomie, curiosité, et envie constante d’apprendre de nouvelles technologies.
